text:
@realDonaldTrump America cares about the following

* Failed covid19 response killing 135,000
* 40,000,000 jobless
* Businesses closing
* Russia Bounties
* Racism & Corruption

Voters see how you failed in covid costing lives & jobs. TX FL AZ now see you lied & people died.
